name: shopify-dev-example
description: A basic, custom-made Shopify theme to showcase development abilities.

scripts.init:
npm install; npm run build; touch variables; echo "PASSWORD=%PASSWORD%
DEV_THEME=%DEV_THEME%
%PROD_THEME=%PROD_THEME%
SHOP=%SHOP%" > variables; touch .gitignore; echo "node_modules
package-lock.json
config.yml
variables" > .gitignore; git checkout -b "development"; git add .; git commit -m "Init"; git push origin development;

author: @krjo
